TestGroupDocumentation.Title: Attribute names contain several punctuation characters. (content tree test)
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: Declare an element with several attributes. Name the attributes using 7 punctuation characters: hyphen ('-', \u002D, HYPHEN-MINUS), period ('.', \u002E, FULL STOP), underscore ('_', \u005F, LOW LINE), dot ('.', \u00B7, MIDDLE DOT), \u0387, GREEK ANO TELEIA, \u06DD, ARABIC END OF AYAH and \u06DE, ARABIC START OF RUB EL HIZB. The document AD_name00111_p.xml sets the attributes to 0, 1, 2, ..., 6 respectively.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: General check of the get method.
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshals AD_name00111_p.xml and expects the returned object to contain attributes to be set to 0, 1, 2, ..., 6 respectively.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: General check of the set method.
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshals AD_name00111_p.xml, set its attributes to values 11, 22, ..., 77 and expects the returned object to contain attributes to be set to 11, 22, ..., 77 respectively.
TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban
